methodology: Rank correlation analysis between CryptoRun scan results and CoinGecko top gainers

interpretation.kendall_tau: Moderate positive rank correlation (0.5) indicating scanner captures ~50% of market ordering
interpretation.spearman_rho: Good monotonic relationship (0.6) suggesting scanner identifies directional momentum well
interpretation.pearson_r: Moderate linear correlation (0.55) with room for improvement in exact rank prediction

1h_window.confidence: low due to small sample size (n=5)

24h_window.confidence: very low due to small sample size

strengths: Perfect BTC identification across both timeframes
Strong 1h correlation (τ=0.67, ρ=0.80) suggests good short-term momentum capture
Scanner tends to rank promising assets higher than market (ADA, DOT outranked)
weaknesses: Sample size too small for statistical confidence
recommendations: Increase sample size to n≥20 for statistical validity
Review guard thresholds causing profitable signal exclusion
Focus optimization on maintaining 1h performance while improving 24h correlation
